data: {"page":1,"results":[{"backdrop_path":"/bMc6evRSgE1BuSyo6RsNQmVgf0l.jpg","id":149374,"title":"Children of Darkness","original_title":"Children of Darkness","overview":"A significant number of American children and teenagers - from all social backgrounds - suffer from mental disorders, schizophrenia, autism and emotional problems, leading them to isolation from society while treating their issues in mental health facilities. But there's no end in sight for those young individuals when they face obstacles and mistreatment in inadequate places under the supervision of careless and inexperienced professionals. Taking place at the Hokkaido Prefectural Sports Center in Hokkaido, the show is headlined by Taichi vs. Tetsuya Naito.","poster_path":"/bfEgPC8O2v96gUouC3nuEETTvbD.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"ja","genre_ids":[28,18],"popularity":8.907,"release_date":"2019-07-15","video":false,"vote_average":8.0,"vote_count":2},{"backdrop_path":"/fYLHQTGLzqlBulYnS9yu1ufRZqR.jpg","id":236628,"title":"The Impatient Patient","original_title":"The Impatient Patient","overview":"Telegram deliverer Daffy Duck is in a swamp, with a message for someone named Chloe, when he starts hiccupping. Unable to stop his hiccups, Daffy decides to seek medical help, in a old house belonging to a Dr. Jerkyl, who advertises his services on a neon sign atop his house. Examining the hiccupping Daffy, Jerkyl decides to use a \"scare cure\" and chemically transforms himself into a goofy lug named Chloe, to whom Daffy had been assigned to deliver the message- a birthday greeting. Chloe chases Daffy around the house, until Daffy uses a syringe to squirt formula into Chloe's mouth, transforming him into a mischievous infant.","poster_path":"/xnOXxPkR1YhWici5s16BNmctpgj.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[16,35],"popularity":2.53,"release_date":"1942-09-04","video":false,"vote_average":6.0,"vote_count":9},{"backdrop_path":"/w4aBHQVPraDa8p4kU2jyvjtY1K5.jpg","id":392615,"title":"Liberation: The Break Through","original_title":"Освобождение 2: Прорыв","overview":"A grandiose military film epic, which does not know analogues in world cinema: the history of the Great Patriotic War from the Battle of the Kursk Bulge to the installation of the Banner of Victory over the Reichstag - \"Liberation\".","poster_path":"/z8jWmBXkBbmgutzSejJVmMZ1oJz.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"ru","genre_ids":[10752,18],"popularity":7.959,"release_date":"1970-05-08","video":false,"vote_average":7.35,"vote_count":20},{"backdrop_path":null,"id":166542,"title":"The Booze Hangs High","original_title":"The Booze Hangs High","overview":"Bosko has a grand time on the farm, dancing with a cow, playing a horse's tail like a violin and getting drunk with three pigs.","poster_path":"/w4nYN5avz0HjpMPU5PZtoMRMGSQ.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[35,16],"popularity":4.497,"release_date":"1930-12-09","video":false,"vote_average":5.0,"vote_count":16},{"backdrop_path":"/cN2S7Jqjzf8031ntigWW2WsvCsB.jpg","id":488883,"title":"Amal","original_title":"أمل","overview":"Amal is 14 years old when she ends up on Tahrir Square during the Egyptian revolution, after the death of her boyfriend in the Port Said Stadium riot. During the protests, she is beaten by police and dragged across the square by her hair. This coming-of-age film follows her over the years after the revolution. As the film cuts between the unfolding current events and Amal’s rapidly changing life and appearance, we see her searching for her own identity in a country in transition. Amal is fiery and fearless, sinking her teeth into the protests and constantly lecturing her mother, who works as a judge. A girl among men, she also has to fight for respect and the right to take part, both in the street and in the rest of her life. In Egypt, even for a young woman like Amal—her name means \"hope\"—the choices open to her for her future are limited.","poster_path":"/hiJcbptMzfGf9HyASRqOnXFLBZy.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"ar","genre_ids":[99],"popularity":3.031,"release_date":"2018-03-15","video":false,"vote_average":8.0,"vote_count":5},{"backdrop_path":"/fNLV8MCNNHkXdFtGxqIIcWg0JYv.jpg","id":712509,"title":"Six Weeks to Twelve Years","original_title":"Six Weeks to Twelve Years","overview":"After the death of their abusive father, two estranged twin brothers must reunite and sell off his property.","poster_path":"/kFHxdUKN0wOwxicowrM2htcL9d5.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[35,18],"popularity":2.471,"release_date":"2020-09-30","video":false,"vote_average":6.125,"vote_count":4},{"backdrop_path":null,"id":466567,"title":"Creative Artists of India: Satyajit Ray","original_title":"Creative Artists of India: Satyajit Ray","overview":"Documentary about Indian filmmaker Satyajit Ray","poster_path":"/xRFtMf7B0HAlG6BwN7M4qWZsLC1.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[99],"popularity":2.825,"release_date":"1974-01-01","video":false,"vote_average":5.0,"vote_count":1},{"backdrop_path":"/oOEXHGn2yRAZY8yO2Tit0ZaZuvI.jpg","id":51437,"title":"Rat Race","original_title":"Je vais craquer !!!","overview":"Young dynamic executive, married and father of two children, Jérôme Ozendron dreams of writing and escaping a life he considers mediocre.
